definitions: a highly toxic compound produced as a byproduct in some manufacturing processes, notably herbicide production and paper bleaching. It is a serious and persistent environmental pollutant.

notes.text: A heterocyclic organochlorine compound; alternative name: 2,3,7,8-tetrachlorodibenzoparadioxin or TCDD; chemical formula: C₁₂H₄O₂Cl₄

shortDefinitions: toxic compound produced as by-product in manufacturing processes

definitions: any of the class of compounds to which dioxin belongs.
shortDefinitions: any of class of compounds to which dioxin belongs
